timeline.message:
Initial commit of AM43 Binding

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

Merge branch '2.5.x' of https://github.com/openhab/openhab-addons into
am43

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

Replace AM43Handler with AM43Handler2 and other finishing touches

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

Make some field final

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

Update code to adhere to community guidelines

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: This method is deprecated. Please set the thing status to UNKNOWN here instead.
timeline.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: The parent handler class is ConnectedBluetoothHandler, so the super.initialize() is required.
replies.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Outch, you've got me there :-) You're obviously right, I missed that.
replies.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: I don't blame you, the bluetooth binding is a unique case 😄
replies.author: cpmeister
